title: Themes
description: Schema for themed groupings of duas used in rounds.

id.description: Unique theme ID referenced by rounds.

title.description: Display title shown in the UI.

description.description: Short description shown in the round header.

suggestions.description: Optional bullet suggestions displayed with the theme.

required.description: Dua IDs always included for this theme.

pool.description: Dua IDs randomly selected from when randomization is enabled.

count.description: Number of items to pull from pool.
